morningVerse: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? - Psalm 27:1
eveningVerse: The Lord is your keeper; the Lord is your shade at your right hand. - Psalm 121:5

morningVerse: For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son. - John 3:16
eveningVerse: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me. - Philippians 4:13

morningVerse: I will never leave you nor forsake you. - Hebrews 13:5
eveningVerse: The Lord is gracious and full of compassion, slow to anger and great in mercy. - Psalm 145:8

morningVerse: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and lean not on your own understanding. - Proverbs 3:5
eveningVerse: Cast all your anxiety on Him because He cares for you. - 1 Peter 5:7

morningVerse: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want. - Psalm 23:1
eveningVerse: Come to Me, all you who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. - Matthew 11:28

morningVerse: I am the way, the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through Me. - John 14:6
eveningVerse: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord. - Jeremiah 29:11

morningVerse: The Lord is good, a stronghold in the day of trouble. - Nahum 1:7
eveningVerse: Do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. - Isaiah 41:10

morningVerse: The Lord is near to all who call on Him. - Psalm 145:18
eveningVerse: The peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and minds. - Philippians 4:7

morningVerse: Delight yourself in the Lord, and He will give you the desires of your heart. - Psalm 37:4
eveningVerse: And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love Him. - Romans 8:28

morningVerse: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified. - Deuteronomy 31:6
eveningVerse: You will keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on You. - Isaiah 26:3

morningVerse: For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son. - John 3:16
eveningVerse: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me. - Philippians 4:13

morningVerse: The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; His mercies never come to an end. - Lamentations 3:22
eveningVerse: The Lord is my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer. - Psalm 18:2

morningVerse: Wait for the Lord; be strong, and let your heart take courage. - Psalm 27:14
eveningVerse: But seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness. - Matthew 6:33

morningVerse: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble. - Psalm 46:1
eveningVerse: The Lord is near to the brokenhearted. - Psalm 34:18

morningVerse: I lift up my eyes to the hills. From where does my help come? My help comes from the Lord. - Psalm 121:1-2
eveningVerse: For nothing will be impossible with God. - Luke 1:37

morningVerse: He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak. - Isaiah 40:29
eveningVerse: The Lord is my strength and my song; He has become my salvation. - Exodus 15:2

morningVerse: Fear not, for I have redeemed you; I have called you by name, you are Mine. - Isaiah 43:1
eveningVerse: The Lord will fight for you, and you have only to be silent. - Exodus 14:14

morningVerse: Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God. - Matthew 5:8
eveningVerse: The Lord is faithful; He will strengthen you and guard you from the evil one. - 2 Thessalonians 3:3

morningVerse: Let everything that has breath praise the Lord. - Psalm 150:6
eveningVerse: The Lord is my helper; I will not fear. - Hebrews 13:6

morningVerse: The Lord your God is with you wherever you go. - Joshua 1:9
eveningVerse: For the Lord your God is gracious and compassionate. - 2 Chronicles 30:9

morningVerse: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in Him. - Psalm 28:7
eveningVerse: For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind. - 2 Timothy 1:7

morningVerse: Do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. - Matthew 6:34
eveningVerse: The Lord will keep you from all harmâ€”He will watch over your life. - Psalm 121:7

morningVerse: The Lord is good to those who wait for Him, to the soul who seeks Him. - Lamentations 3:25
eveningVerse: For where two or three are gathered in My name, there am I among them. - Matthew 18:20

morningVerse: For the word of God is living and active, sharper than any two-edged sword. - Hebrews 4:12
eveningVerse: The Lord bless you and keep you. - Numbers 6:24

morningVerse: Come, let us bow down in worship, let us kneel before the Lord our Maker. - Psalm 95:6
eveningVerse: The Lord is a refuge for the oppressed, a stronghold in times of trouble. - Psalm 9:9

morningVerse: Whoever dwells in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty. - Psalm 91:1
eveningVerse: I am with you always, to the very end of the age. - Matthew 28:20

morningVerse: God is love, and the one who remains in love remains in God, and God in him. - 1 John 4:16
eveningVerse: The Lord is my portion, says my soul, therefore I will hope in Him. - Lamentations 3:24

morningVerse: Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path. - Psalm 119:105
eveningVerse: The Lord is my refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble. - Psalm 46:1

morningVerse: In all your ways acknowledge Him, and He will make your paths straight. - Proverbs 3:6
eveningVerse: The Lord is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger, abounding in love. - Psalm 103:8

morningVerse: But those who wait on the Lord shall renew their strength. - Isaiah 40:31
eveningVerse: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. - Philippians 4:23

morningVerse: Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God. - Matthew 5:8
